Title: Low Turnip Turnout
Description:
Your help here is appreciated, $n. I'd like to give you another job, if you're interested.

My son, Ang, runs the small farm just down this hill. He should have brought me some fruits and vegetables this morning, but I haven't seen him all day.

Would you go down there and see what's going on?
ObjectivesCompletionText: Find Ang Thunderfoot at the Thunderfoot Farm in the Valley of the Four Winds.
RewardText:
Wha-? Who the...? My father sent you?

Pshh... he can be so nosy sometimes. I have everything under control here.
